mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as notReadNum,ICH.ims_chat_to_receive_id as imsReceiveId FROM ims_chat ICH LEFT JOIN ims_msg IMG ON ICH.ims_chat_last_read_time < IMG.ims_msg_create_time AND ICH.ims_chat_send_user_login_id = IMG.ims_msg_send_user_login_id and ICH.ims_chat_send_user_login_id = #{userLoginId} AND ICH.ims_chat_to_receive_id = IMG.ims_msg_receive_id GROUP BY ICH.ims_chat_to_receive_id

SELECT c.ims_msg_receive_id as imsMsgReceiveId, c.ims_msg_send_user_login_id as imsMsgSendUserLoginId, c.ims_msg_id as imsMsgId, c.ims_msg_create_time as imsMsgCreateTime, c.ims_msg_content as imsMsgContent, c.ims_msg_type as imsMsgType FROM ( SELECT * FROM ims_msg a WHERE a.ims_msg_send_user_login_id = #{historyEntity.userLoginId} AND a.ims_msg_receive_id = #{historyEntity.receiveId} UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ims_msg b WHERE b.ims_msg_send_user_login_id = #{historyEntity.receiveId} AND b.ims_msg_receive_id = #{historyEntity.userLoginId} ) c ORDER BY c.ims_msg_create_time ASC
limit ${historyEntity.start},${historyEntity.end}
